original_text: But you, Job, did you ever command the morning to begin? No! You have never in your whole life told the sun when it should rise. But you, Job, did you ever command the morning to begin? No! You have never in your whole life told the sun when it should rise. But you, Job, did you ever command the morning to begin?
korean_text: 네가 너의 날에 아침에게 명령하였느냐 새벽에게 그 자리를 일러 주었느냐

sentences.original_text: did you ever command the morning to begin?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 아침이 시작하라고 명령한 적이 있느냐?

sentences.original_text: You have never in your whole life
told the sun when it should rise.
sentences.korean_translation: 해가 언제 떠야 하는지 말한 적이 없다.

sentences.original_text: did you ever command the morning to begin?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 아침이 시작하라고 명령한 적이 있느냐?

sentences.original_text: You have never in your whole life
told the sun when it should rise.
sentences.korean_translation: 해가 언제 떠야 하는지 말한 적이 없다.

sentences.original_text: did you ever command the morning to begin?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 아침이 시작하라고 명령한 적이 있느냐?
